w :  why are you so upset and worried ?
m :  i ' ve been racking my brains all morning  trying to recall where i put my gold watch .  but it has been in vain .

question: what do we learn about the man ?
choice: he just cannot work properly without a watch .
he has no idea where he can buy a gold watch .
he still does not know where he left his watch .
answer: he still does not know where he left his watch .
